net.joala.testlet

Class UtilityClassTestlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.joala.testlet.AbstractTestlet<Class<?>>
      • net.joala.testlet.UtilityClassTestlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Testlet

    public class UtilityClassTestlet
extends AbstractTestlet<Class<?>>

    Test to verify if provided class meets utility class requirements. This is especially useful to get code coverage for required private constructors.

    Since:
    10/5/12

    • Constructor Summary

      Builds the testlet with the specified class under test.
